definitions.definition: to believe in (an ideology, faith or religion); to have faith in

parsedExamples.example: 信仰宗教  ―  xìnyǎng zōngjiào  ―  to have religious faith

parsedExamples.translation: Yìdìliàn néng gěi wǒmen dàilái duōshǎo de huānlè, yǐzhìyú wǒmen shì nàme de xìnyǎng. [Pinyin]

examples: 信仰宗教  ―  xìnyǎng zōngjiào  ―  to have religious faith
